# Replace NA values by 0 in Pest_Value, RH2 and EVP
```{r}

# Replacing NA values with 0 only in selected columns
vars_to_replace=c("Pest_value", "RH2(%)", "EVP(mm)")

infestationData_1 =infestationData %>% mutate_at(.vars=vars_to_replace, .funs = funs(ifelse(is.na(.), 0, .)))

df_status(infestationData_1)

```
